channel.title: Please help server problems!
channel.description:
Well, Ive been aving server problems... My firewall is fine... himachi running... no-ip running... source (runserver)running and it says 0.0.0.0:43594... Everything is fine... But no-one can get on.. i have port forwarded...And still nothing....
I was using wireless when the server was running... But then i had wireless troubles... So instead of wireless i plugged my wires... From the Wireless box to my computer... and it worked... ( well i connected to internet )... then i found my server wasn't working -.-..
This is the problem...
If anyone can help me it would much be apriciated!!!! =[ :( :(

item.title: Please help server problems!
item.dc:creator: @Nazgand Nazgand
item.description:
@Nazgand wrote:

Have you looked up port forwarding? I used to have this problem.
PM me your router type, And I will send you the link with instructions.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help server problems!
item.dc:creator: @i_am_the_dog i am the dog
item.description:
@i_am_the_dog wrote:

ya i had the same problem download a auto server restarter… when u get the run server bat. type ur ip in with it… ummm what else?.. o yea ur ip u can use ur hami one… make a server name and pass… and it should work

Read full topic

item.title: Please help server problems!
item.dc:creator: @l_Whitney_l l Whitney l
item.description:
@l_Whitney_l wrote:

Everytime Router reconnects to your computer i believe your IP changes.

Read full topic
